description: More detailed information about a Creo dimension

data.name: location
data.description: Coordinates of the dimension in drawing units

data.name: tol_lower_limit
data.description: Tolerance Lower Limit - only set if tolerance_type=limits

data.name: tol_upper_limit
data.description: Tolerance Upper Limit - only set if tolerance_type=limits

data.name: tol_plus
data.description: Tolerance Plus Value - only set if tolerance_type=plus_minus

data.name: tol_minus
data.description: Tolerance Minus Value - only set if tolerance_type=plus_minus

data.name: tol_symmetric_value
data.description: Tolerance Symmetric Value - only set if tolerance_type=symmetric or sym_superscript

data.name: tol_table_name
data.description: Tolerance Table Name - only set if tolerance_type=isodin

data.name: tol_table_column
data.description: Tolerance Table Column - only set if tolerance_type=isodin

data.name: tol_table_type
data.description: Tolerance Table Type - only set if tolerance_type=isodin
